smart_goals.description: Reduce HbA1c from 8.1% to below 7% within the next 3 months by monitoring blood glucose 4 times daily (before meals and at bedtime) and logging readings for review at the 4-week follow-up appointment
Achieve weight loss of 20-25 pounds (from 185 lbs to 160-165 lbs) over the next 6 months through balanced nutrition and portion control, limiting carbohydrate intake to 45-60 grams per meal
Complete 150 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity (brisk walking, swimming, or cycling) per week, spread across at least 3 sessions, starting immediately
Perform strength training exercises 2-3 times per week to improve insulin sensitivity, beginning this week
Lower blood pressure from 135/85 mmHg to below 130/80 mmHg within 3 months through reduced sodium intake and regular physical activity
Reduce LDL cholesterol from 120 mg/dL to below 100 mg/dL within 3 months by increasing intake of omega-3 rich foods (fatty fish and walnuts) to at least 2 servings per week
Schedule and complete annual eye exam and foot check within the next 30 days for preventive care
